main event: A report detailing a sighting of an unidentified flying object (UFO) in San Antonio, Texas, on April 22, 1964.
interesting points: The object was described as a crescent shape that appeared to split into halves and then resume its original shape., The observation lasted approximately fifteen minutes., The witness reported a clear sky with some clouds and no rain., The report included a weather analysis at Randolph AFB during the time of sighting., The preliminary analysis suggested that what was observed might have been an optical illusion caused by clouds and ground objects.
witness description: a civilian salesman, deemed fairly reliable
